title: Why does Shaco E per level but lee sin Q is flat at rank 1.
body:
lee sin Q is the most punishing spell to get hit by in the entire league of legends jungle. there is nothing you can possibly do to duel a lee sin if he lands his Q. I think we're all sick and tired of having no control of the jungle because lee sin can Q us from fog of war and kill us or force us away from our buffs. why doesn't his Q scale per fucking level so it doesn't do half our hp early game.

when you have no damn armor early game 8% of your missing health is a lot of fucking damage. by comparison shaco E has a lower base damage and it does 2% of your missing hp at early levels. lee sin Q does 4 times its damage.


please do not nerf lee sin ult. and nerf his Q damage.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hayaishi2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=94msFI3m,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-30T22:18:05.437+0000)
>
> dodge it?

from fog of war? how?

1. How did he know you was there?
2. There's these things called wards.
3. After placing such ward, Sidestep, or leave the area.
4. Lee sin is meant to be early game dominant that falls off late, unless he get's a lead an knows how to snowball.

5. why compare targeted ability vs skillshot?

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=94msFI3m,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-30T22:18:23.047+0000)
>
> from fog of war? how?

How does he know you are there? Fog of War works both ways.
Move to the left or to the right, both work really.
Because you can dodge an ability that comes from fog of war or from up-close, right?

> [{quoted}](name=Needler4,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=94msFI3m,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-12-30T22:21:38.129+0000)
>
> Because you can dodge an ability that comes from fog of war or from up-close, right?

Then he has an advantage over you. How does he know you are there? fog of war works both ways.
He can gank from jungle, because his q is pretty long range.

https://i5.walmartimages.com/asr/1acd8c45-559d-47a8-a310-ac1a1341c34e_1.29654fc2ed6c93c70f6bb3fd41639309.jpeg
Every time I see you I get hungry

>lee sin Q is the most punishing spell to get hit by in the entire league of legends jungle

downvoting just for this sentence.
Any reason or proper argument or just random idiocy?

ffs it's not even the most punishing spell on Lee Sin. 
His R is far more punishing to get hit by than his Q.
